# My Thoughts and Things


_powered by [fastpages](https://github.com/fastai/fastpages)_

I thought it might be fun to outline a process that I use to write. I think
that using a version control system like git provides an excellent opportunity
to try out various workflows.

First of all, I'm going to gitignore the drafts folder. I'm essentially
publishing them if I push them up to the repo where people can read them. I'm
far too anxious for that.

Next, I'll create a branch and a PR for each post. This is just to ensure I
don't break anything with the site building.

I will strive for a weekly cadence, but I may not be able to keep it up.
